original: Danielsson, Lars Hilmer, kyrkoher-d^e, Ös’t’adku.lile, f. 21/9/91 i Frände-fors, Älvsb. 1. G. 28 m. Elin Jacobson. Barn: Marianne f. 29, Lars-Gö-ran 31, Anna-Brita 32, Sven 34. — Stud:ex., teol. fil. ex., teol. kand. o. prästex. V. pastor i Källby 27-28, kommin. i S. Fågelås 28-38, kyrkoh. i Lena sed. 38. Ordf. i skolråd, kyrkostämma o. barnav:nd i S. Fågel-ås 29-38, ordf. i Fullestads kyrkostäm- ma sed. 39, past:stämman i Lena past. sed. 39 o. i Lena barnav:nd sed. 43, chef f. Lena hemv:omr. sed. 40.
translated: Danielsson, Lars Hilmer, parish priest, Östadsjö, born on September 21st, 1891 in Frändefors, Älvsborg county. Married to Elin Jacobson on 1928. Children: Marianne born in 1929, Lars-Göran born in 1931, Anna-Brita born in 1932, and Sven born in 1934. He completed his studies in theology and is a graduate of theology and a licensed pastor. He served as an assistant pastor in Källby from 1927-1928, curate in S. Fågelås from 1928-1938, and parish priest in Lena since 1938. He was chairman of the school board, church meeting, and child welfare in S. Fågelås from 1929-1938, chairman of the church meeting in Fullestad since 1939, pastor's meeting in Lena since 1939, and child welfare in Lena since 1943. He was head of the Lena home guard district since 1940.

jobTitle.title: Head of the Lena home guard district
